main event: One bright, luminous yellowish-white object was observed for 2-3 seconds, moving in a straight line at a moderately fast speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2-3 seconds., The object was bright and luminous with a yellowish-white color., There were no photographs included with the report., The conclusion suggested it might be an aircraft or possibly a balloon., The report was a part of Project Blue Book's UFO documentation.
